Title: UK government calls for energy savings
Description: The UK government called on people to start cutting their energy consumption almost a month after Rishi Sunak became Prime Minister, and seven weeks after National Grid warned the country faces blackouts if it cannot import enough gas and electricity from the EU.
Author: DE

Title: EU member states agree on mandatory joint gas purchases, creation of EU LNG benchmark
Description: EU member states agreed to jointly purchase gas next year and create an EU LNG benchmark price, as part of their latest market intervention package to ensure the bloc's security of supply and mitigate the unprecedented gas shortage facing the bloc.
Author: DE

Title: EU underground gas storage must be almost half full by 1 February
Description: EU underground gas storage must be almost half full by the start of February the European Commission established when setting out next year’s refilling targets. Targets are meant to ensure the optimisation of storage and to reinforce the bloc's security of supply amid the unprecedented gas shortage facing the EU.
Author: DE

Title: India’s Gail issues tender to buy and sell 12 LNG cargoes as part of a swap
Description: India’s state-owned gas distributor Gail is offering 12 cargoes that will load at the Cheniere-operated 30 mtpa Sabine Pass LNG terminal in the US between January and December next year and also buy 12 cargoes for delivery to India over the same period as part of a swap tender. The tender closes on Dec. 1.
Author: CK

Title: Coral South FLNG’s first LNG cargo heads to Western Europe
Description: The maiden LNG shipment from Mozambique’s first LNG project, the 3.4 mtpa Coral South, is heading to Western Europe after its departure from the Coral Sul floating LNG facility on Nov. 13.
Author: CK
